reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were very, very lucky to get a last minute booking over the holiday weekend. There was one room left and I'm so glad we managed to spend a couple of nights here on our trip.
reviews.title: Simply wonderful

likes.disliked: — oh, just too hard to pick something!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's such a relaxing, calming and friendly place to spend some time. Nici, the owner, has thought of absolutely everything to make a stay here just as you would expect.
reviews.title: Can't Wait To Go Back!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There's no check in, just talk to Nici before you go and she gives you a code for your room, so arrive, let yourself in and enjoy the view from your room.
reviews.title: Unique, memorable weekend away

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is delivered to your room during the day. While we were there we had eggs, fruit, bacon on one day, and the next we had smoked salmon. The fridge is stacked full of goodies (breakfast items are included in the price of the room, and the things you pay for are clearly marked). It's a great way of taking breakfast - at your own pace on your own balcony.
reviews.title: An amazingly unique hotel concept experience!

likes.disliked: — Can't find one single fault - LOVED IT!

reviews.title: A blissful, stylish place to stay
reviews.text: The rooms are simple, but beautifully designed. Huge bed (a little hard for me); lovely bathroom with Aesop products (we went on to find an Aesop store in Sydney and bought a load of stuff); each room has a tranquil view. Everything about the rooms makes you feel relaxed, comfortable and right at home, and waking up to that view in the morning just makes you feel great.
